name: Blood II: The Chosen
description:
Blood II: The Chosen is an action-shooter game developed by Monolith Productions. It was originally released in 1998. GT Interactive Software published the game. Blood II: The Chosen has a Metascore of 72, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Blood II: The Chosen on PC.
It was produced by Karen Burger. Daniel Bernstein, Guy Whitmore and Matt Allen scored the game.
